summary: No new characters or connections in this chapter.
summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (12 ties).
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (12), Pyotr Petrovich Luzhin (5), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (4), Porfiry Petrovich (4)
story_summary: Raskolnikov visits his mother, Pulcheria Alexandrovna, who is overjoyed to see him despite his disheveled appearance. They share an emotional reunion, with Raskolnikov expressing his love for her and asking her to always believe in him. As they talk, Pulcheria reveals her worries about Raskolnikov's well-being, sensing that something is troubling him. After their heartfelt exchange, Raskolnikov leaves, feeling a mix of relief and anguish.
